Area Code.title: Stay W. Me 2nite
lyrics: Stay up for a little while
Talk to me, lets go get
It's three A.M. and I gotta go
It's not like I'm saying no
But I only wanted to stay 'til eight
I didn't want to stay this late...
I won't put up a fight
I won't put up a fight

Area Code.title: Rendezvous
lyrics: I'll get where I need to be
So there's no need to worry
When you held me so closely
My stress slipped away from me

Area Code.title: Lover
lyrics: Those summer plans with your lover
Won't work out 'cause you'll find one
Can we last through spring time
And make it 'til summer where I lie
For hours with you in my arms
We'll live life on our own terms
Oh, its only a matter of time
I'll see you and life will be just fine
I just want this insecurity to go away
So that I can pretend to feel okay

Area Code.title: Flake
lyrics: Said I was sick but I faked it
Wanna play but I hate it
A feeling that I won't be leaving soon
I feel like my heart's dry heaving
Said I was sick but I faked it
Wanna play but I hate it
Wanna play but I hate it...
A feeling that I won't be leaving soon
I feel like my heart's dry heaving

Area Code.title: Fader
lyrics: I think her words were slurred
And I think I'd upset her

Area Code.title: Quink
lyrics: Wish I could trash my past sometimes
My hindsight is below the average kind
And if I get rid of my public posts
Would I seem less confident than most?
Were not dependent on this shit
From the ones who had a better fit
Wonder how I'd be if I lived then
I'd probably not be that different
But I'd probably have more confidence

Suburban Dogs.title: Dog
lyrics: I'd like to see it's like
until the sky gets too dark

Suburban Dogs.title: Come Around
lyrics: I wish we could calm down
I wish you could come around
Wanna let my guard down for you
I wish we could calm down
I wish you could come around
Been a tense past couple of months now
My head's turning and I don't think I'm learning
I've got more problems under my belt
Don't be sorry I know how you feel
The way you feel right now is surreal
I wish we could calm down
I wish you could come around
Wanna let my guard down for you
I wish we could calm down
I wish you could come around
A little time should fix how I am now
But should I keep that point of view?
I'll be alright when the day turns from night
How I cope isn't how we grew
Just know that I'll still say this
I wish we could calm down
I wish you could come around
Wanna let my guard down for you
I wish we could calm down
I wish you could come around

Suburban Dogs.title: New Feel
lyrics: A clear mind and you know
Writing songs doesn't help my case
When I'm focused on a feeling
I'm comfortable for the most part
I thought commitment would kill it
I stay stagnant but the seasons change
I'm still bitter but you love the same
For you I'll try for a better day
I don't deserve all the things you say
I stay stagnant but the seasons change
I'm still bitter but you love the same
For you I'll try for a better day
I don't deserve all the things you say

Suburban Dogs.title: Uneasy
lyrics: my head was fucked up, dizzy
red cups still on the table
so if you think i'm lost
or if my heart dropped off
just tell me if yuo thought
I don't think there's a way
you'd tell me all the things
you told me, I love that exchange

Suburban Dogs.title: Porter Ave
lyrics: i bet you'd love to hear
that i'm sorry I lashed out
but I'm not there right now
i know i broke my promise
but i still thought it was worth it
on the backroads to my lover
and i know you can't trust me anymore
than loving her behind closed doors
i wish it could be different

Suburban Dogs.title: Buddy
lyrics: is that really what you mean
my heart just began to beat for you
and my hand's still caught up on your jeans
was I just a dancing partner
I thought we'd last out for the summer
but now I'm stuck inside my home
I was breaking at my seams
I don't know what came over us
and I don't know if it was just me
to think we'd always be okay
but when the leaves turn back to deep green
I hope you'll love me all the same

Suburban Dogs.title: Crumb
lyrics: I wanna focus on the good times
they seem to pass as i write
where we only loved each other,
it doesn't come quite as easy
a cloudy day fucks my whole week
I don't know if I've felt it for awhile
but I know I haven't smiled
and I don't know what's worthwhile

Suburban Dogs.title: Miss Me
lyrics: cause its getting to a point that's similar
and I keep them bottled up inside

Suburban Dogs.title: Good For You
lyrics: how can you turn and walk away?
think on the things you said
didn't think I'd feel like this again
can't get her voice out of my head
can't get her voice out of my head
joy is now an old feel
you needed your own time to heal

Suburban Dogs.title: Morgan Ave
lyrics: I'm tired of the way I live
My mood swings back and forth
I'm young but I'm still numb

Apathy.title: Apathy
lyrics: I can't be someone you rely on
I've got my own problems to deny, man
If I'm given a chance to go
catch me leaving out the back door
they say we're a product of those around us
in that case I'm apathetic, honest
I wanna break free from the shackles
of this life that I'm currently trapped in
I can't be someone you rely on
I've got my own problems to deny, man
If I'm given a chance to go
catch me leaving out the back door

Silver Lining.title: Poem
lyrics: Things are tough in the night time
I've said it a million damn times
I've gotten closer to a deeper slumber
Well, sometimes I think of it
Cause the last was a bummer
These words I write so quickly

Silver Lining.title: Bail Bond
lyrics: He needs her like a bail bond, baby
She needs him in this bad dream she's going through
Things were better back in Chicago I think
At least as far as me and my friends know
I hope she makes it back
"I call her when to save me
This bed is awfully cold without you
And when we're back to dad's house
I'll leave at night so I won't rouse
Suspicion and we'll do the cycle again"
you see me like a heartthrob baby
and even after all that you saved me
I couldn't be more in love"
It's more like playing 'round with some broken glass
he's still over there high off his fucking ass
but he stayed because you're there for him
"and I know, and I know, and I know baby
Life would be better if we started a family
We'll be in this house alone
get away from the people you know
we could take it fast or slow

Silver Lining.title: Seatbelt
lyrics: Unbuckle seatbelt when life gets harder
he said it's something that some people don't tell you
I guess I'm one of those few
don't expect me to tell you
it seems I get like this on normal days
all my problems they just seem so cliche
it's tough to think clear going into the new year
but sometimes the dark seems so soft
you sat right next to me on the car ride when its rainy
and you'll be right there with me on the way to university
Unbuckle seatbelt when life gets harder
he said it's something that some people don't tell you
I guess I'm one of those few
don't expect me to tell you
Unbuckle seatbelt when life gets harder
he said it's something that some people don't tell you
I guess I'm one of those few
don't expect me to tell you

Self.title: Self
lyrics: You told me to work on myself sometimes
but it's hard when you're always on my mind
I'll try it in the dark of night
but that's when the thought of you comes by
any other time of day, forget what I wanna say
Cause All I do is think of you
I'm helpless, the way I'm here all day and night
it's useless, my heart sit still
why can't I spend my time thinking about something else?
I'll try to clear my head now, but I can't help that it's myself
so i'll just sit here and nurse my tea
just waiting until you're through with me
cause' I know this is how it ends
it's always something that I gotta amend
I'll try to keep my distance well
cause' if I don't I'll be going through hell
it's just a little thing that hurts
but through the night it'll just get worse
Cause All I do is think of you
I'm helpless, the way I'm here all day and night
it's useless, my heart sit still
why can't I spend my time thinking about something else?
I'll try to clear my head now, but I can't help that it's myself
